actions.committee: House Committee on Energy and Commerce
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Energy and Commerce.

actions.in_committee: House Committee on Energy and Commerce
actions.text: Referred to Subcommittee on Commerce, Transportation and Tourism.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Commerce, Transportation and Tourism

official_title: A bill to amend the Railroad Retirement Act of 1974 to eliminate the reduction of railroad retirement annuities by amounts payable as social security benefits in cases of persons who had at least 10 years of service, and had attained the age of 65 as of the effective date of such Act.

summary.text: Amends the Railroad Retirement Act of 1974 to eliminate the reduction of railroad retirement annuities by the amount of social security benefits received by persons 65 years of age with ten years or more of service.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Railroad Retirement Act of 1974 to eliminate the reduction of railroad retirement annuities by amounts payable as social security benefits in cases of persons who had at least 10 years of service, and had attained the age of 65 as of the effective date of such Act.
